artist: Artist: Auguste Louis Lepère; Editor: A. Desmoulins
description: three figures leaning over railing of bridge--two men holding fishing poles; Notre Dame Cathedral at left; text: "Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards" and "Bois Originaux de A. Lepère"
portfolio: From Le Long de la Seine et des Boulevards
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1998; set of 20 plates with frontispiece sold in May for AOOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Frontispiece from "Along the Seine and the Boulevards"
